statements: SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_activities;
SELECT case_id, case_name FROM conflict_resolution_activities WHERE status='active';
SELECT case_name, case_description, status FROM conflict_resolution_activities WHERE stakeholder_id=5;
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_activities ORDER BY case_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_activities WHERE status='completed' ORDER BY case_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_activities WHERE case_id = 1;
SELECT case_name, case_description FROM conflict_resolution_activities WHERE stakeholder_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_activities WHERE status = 'Resolved';
SELECT case_name, status FROM conflict_resolution_activities WHERE stakeholder_id IN (3, 4);
SELECT case_id, case_name, case_description FROM conflict_resolution_activities ORDER BY case_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_activities;
SELECT case_id, case_name FROM conflict_resolution_activities ORDER BY case_id DESC;
SELECT case_name, progress_percentage FROM conflict_resolution_activities WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT * FROM stakeholders;
SELECT stakeholder_name, role FROM stakeholders ORDER BY stakeholder_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_activities WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT stakeholder_name, contact_info FROM stakeholders WHERE role = 'Project Manager';
SELECT case_name FROM conflict_resolution_activities ORDER BY case_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM stakeholders WHERE stakeholder_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT case_name, progress_percentage FROM conflict_resolution_activities WHERE progress_percentage <= 25 ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC;
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_cases;
SELECT case_id, case_name FROM conflict_resolution_cases;
SELECT case_id, case_name, case_status FROM conflict_resolution_cases WHERE case_status='Open';
SELECT resolution_id, case_id, stakeholder_id, progress_status FROM resolution_progress ORDER BY progress_status DESC;
SELECT stakeholder_id, stakeholder_name, stakeholder_role FROM stakeholders WHERE stakeholder_role='Manager';
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_cases;
SELECT * FROM stakeholders WHERE stakeholder_role = 'Lawyer';
SELECT case_id, case_name, progress_status FROM conflict_resolution_cases JOIN resolution_progress ON conflict_resolution_cases.case_id = resolution_progress.case_id;
SELECT stakeholder_name, progress_description FROM stakeholders JOIN resolution_progress ON stakeholders.stakeholder_id = resolution_progress.stakeholder_id WHERE progress_status = 'In Progress';

SELECT case_id, case_name, stakeholder_name, progress_status FROM conflict_resolution_cases JOIN resolution_progress ON conflict_resolution_cases.case_id = resolution_progress.case_id JOIN stakeholders ON stakeholders.stakeholder_id = resolution_progress.stakeholder_id WHERE case_status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM conflict_cases;
SELECT case_name, case_description FROM conflict_cases WHERE case_id = 1;
SELECT stakeholder_name, stakeholder_role FROM stakeholders ORDER BY stakeholder_role DESC;
SELECT activity_name, activity_type FROM activities WHERE activity_type LIKE '%meeting%';
SELECT progress_id, progress_status FROM progress_tracking WHERE case_id = 2 ORDER BY progress_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM conflict_cases;
SELECT case_name, case_description FROM conflict_cases WHERE case_id = 1;

SELECT st.stakeholder_name, a.activity_name, pt.progress_status FROM stakeholders st JOIN progress_tracking pt ON st.stakeholder_id = pt.stakeholder_id JOIN activities a ON pt.activity_id = a.activity_id;
SELECT * FROM progress_tracking WHERE progress_status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY case_id DESC;
SELECT MAX(progress_id) AS max_progress_id FROM progress_tracking;
SELECT * FROM stakeholder
SELECT case_name, case_status FROM conflict_cases
SELECT activity_name, activity_date FROM resolution_activities WHERE activity_status = 'IN PROGRESS'
SELECT stakeholder_name, contact_email FROM stakeholders WHERE stakeholder_role = 'Client'
SELECT update_description, update_date FROM progress_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC
SELECT * FROM conflict_cases WHERE case_status = 'OPEN';
SELECT case_name, case_description FROM conflict_cases ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT stakeholder_name, contact_email FROM stakeholders WHERE stakeholder_role = 'Client';
SELECT activity_name, activity_description, activity_status FROM resolution_activities WHERE activity_status = 'IN PROGRESS' ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM progress_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC, case_id;
